name: yelp_search
description: This endpoint returns up to 1000 businesses with some basic information based on the provided search criteria.

location.description: Required if either latitude or longitude is not provided. This string indicates the geographic area to be used when searching for businesses. Examples: 'New York City', 'NYC', '350 5th Ave, New York, NY 10118'. Businesses returned in the response may not be strictly within the specified location.

latitude.description: Required, if location is not provided. Latitude of the location to search from. If latitude is provided, longitude is required too.

longitude.description: Required if location is not provided. Longitude of the location to search from. If longitude is provided, latitude is required too.

term.description: Search term, e.g. 'food' or 'restaurants'. The term may also be the business's name, such as 'Starbucks'. If term is not included the endpoint will default to searching across businesses from a small number of popular categories.

radius.description: A suggested search radius in meters. This field is used as a suggestion to the search. The actual search radius may be lower than the suggested radius in dense urban areas, and higher in regions of less business density. If the specified value is too large, a AREA_TOO_LARGE error may be returned. The max value is 40,000 meters (about 25 miles).

categories.description: Categories to filter the search results with. See the list of supported categories. The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories. e.g., 'bars,french' will filter by Bars OR French. The category alias should be used (e.g. 'discgolf', not 'Disc Golf').

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

price.description: Pricing levels to filter the search result with: 1 = $, 2 = $$, 3 = $$$, 4 = $$$$. The price filter can be a list of comma delimited pricing levels. e.g., '1, 2, 3' will filter the results to show the ones that are $, $$, or $$$.

open_now.description: When set to true, only return the businesses that are open now. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together. Default is True.

open_at.description: An integer representing the Unix time in the timezone of the search location. If specified, it will return businesses open at the given time. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together.

attributes.description: Try these additional filters to return specific search results! ['hot_and_new', 'request_a_quote', 'reservation', 'waitlist_reservation', 'deals', 'gender_neutral_restrooms', 'open_to_all', 'wheelchair_accessible'].

sort_by.description: Suggestion to the search algorithm that the results be sorted by one of the these modes: best_match, rating, review_count or distance. The default is best_match. Note that specifying the sort_by is a suggestion (not strictly enforced) to Yelp's search, which considers multiple input parameters to return the most relevant results.  e.g., the rating sort is not strictly sorted by the rating value, but by an adjusted rating value that takes into account the number of ratings, similar to a Bayesian average. This is to prevent skewing results to businesses with a single review.

reservation_covers.description: How many people are attending the reservation.

matches_party_size_param.description: Whether to filter out results that don't have openings matching the params.

limit.description: Number of results to return. Default is 20.

offset.description: Offset the list of returned results by this amount. Default is 0.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_phone_search
description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses based on the provided phone number. It is possible for more than one business to have the same phone number (for example, chain stores with the same +1 800 phone number).

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

phone.description: Phone number of the business you want to search for. It must start with + and include the country code, like +14159083801.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_business_details
description: This endpoint returns detailed business content. Normally, you'll get the Business ID from function 'yelp_search', 'yelp_phone_search', 'yelp_food_delivery_search' or 'yelp_autocomplete'. To retrieve review excerpts for a business, please refer to function 'yelp_reviews'.

business_id_or_alias.description: A unique identifier for a Yelp Business. Can be either a 22-character Yelp Business ID, or a Yelp Business Alias.

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_food_delivery_search
description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses which support food delivery service.

location.description: Required if either latitude or longitude is not provided. This string indicates the geographic area to be used when searching for businesses. Examples: 'New York City', 'NYC', '350 5th Ave, New York, NY 10118'. Businesses returned in the response may not be strictly within the specified location.

latitude.description: Required, if location is not provided. Latitude of the location to search from. If latitude is provided, longitude is required too.

longitude.description: Required if location is not provided. Longitude of the location to search from. If longitude is provided, latitude is required too.

term.description: Search term, e.g. 'food' or 'restaurants'. The term may also be the business's name, such as 'Starbucks'. If term is not included the endpoint will default to searching across businesses from a small number of popular categories.

categories.description: Categories to filter the search results with. See the list of supported categories. The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories. e.g., 'bars,french' will filter by Bars OR French. The category alias should be used (e.g. 'discgolf', not 'Disc Golf').

price.description: Pricing levels to filter the search result with: 1 = $, 2 = $$, 3 = $$$, 4 = $$$$. The price filter can be a list of comma delimited pricing levels. e.g., '1, 2, 3' will filter the results to show the ones that are $, $$, or $$$.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_reviews
description: This endpoint returns up to three review excerpts for a given business ordered by either of the following: Yelp's default sort order or Newest first. Normally, you'll get the Business ID from function 'yelp_search', 'yelp_phone_search', 'yelp_food_delivery_search' or 'yelp_autocomplete'.

business_id_or_alias.description: A unique identifier for a Yelp Business. Can be either a 22-character Yelp Business ID, or a Yelp Business Alias.

if_sort_by_auto.description: True: sort by auto; False: sort by newest. Default is True

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

limit.description: Number of results to return. Default is 20.

offset.description: Offset the list of returned results by this amount. Default is 0.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_event_search
description: Returns events that match search criteria.

location.description: Required if either latitude or longitude is not provided. This string indicates the geographic area to be used when searching for businesses. Examples: 'New York City', 'NYC', '350 5th Ave, New York, NY 10118'. Businesses returned in the response may not be strictly within the specified location.

latitude.description: Required, if location is not provided. Latitude of the location to search from. If latitude is provided, longitude is required too.

longitude.description: Required if location is not provided. Longitude of the location to search from. If longitude is provided, latitude is required too.

radius.description: A suggested search radius in meters. This field is used as a suggestion to the search. The actual search radius may be lower than the suggested radius in dense urban areas, and higher in regions of less business density. If the specified value is too large, a AREA_TOO_LARGE error may be returned. The max value is 40,000 meters (about 25 miles).

categories.description: Categories to filter the search results with. See the list of supported categories. The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories. e.g., 'bars,french' will filter by Bars OR French. The category alias should be used (e.g. 'discgolf', not 'Disc Golf').

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

if_sort_by_desc.description: True: sort by desc; False: sort by asc. Default is True.

if_sort_on_popularity.description: True: sort on popularity; False: sort on time_start. Default is True.

start_date.description: Start date. Will return events that only begin at or after the specified time.

end_date.description: End date. Will return events that only end at or before the specified time.

excluded_events.description: List of event ids. Events associated with these event ids in this list will not show up in the response.

limit.description: Number of results to return. Default is 20.

offset.description: Offset the list of returned results by this amount. Default is 0.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_event_details
description: This endpoint returns the detailed information of a Yelp event. You can get the event ID from function 'yelp_event_search'.

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_all_categories
description: This endpoint returns all Yelp business categories across all locales by default. Include the 'locale' parameter to filter to only those categories available for a particular locale, and translate/localize the names of those categories.

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_category_details
description: This endpoint returns detailed information about the Yelp category specified by a Yelp category alias. The alias for each category can be found either by using the function 'yelp_all_categories'.

locale.description: Locale code in the format of {language code}_{country code}.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: yelp_autocomplete
description: This endpoint returns autocomplete suggestions for search keywords, businesses, and categories based on the input text.

apikey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

location.description: Required if either latitude or longitude is not provided. This string indicates the geographic area to be used when searching for businesses. Examples: 'New York City', 'NYC', '350 5th Ave, New York, NY 10118'. Businesses returned in the response may not be strictly within the specified location.

latitude.description: Required, if location is not provided. Latitude of the location to search from. If latitude is provided, longitude is required too.

longitude.description: Required if location is not provided. Longitude of the location to search from. If longitude is provided, latitude is required too.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
